description: Upward Mobility's AACN Cardiac Medicine Subspecialty Certification (CMC) Exam Prep app for Palm webOS contains 249 targeted questions to rigorously prepare you for the CMC exam, with a focus on clinical judgment.  All content was written exclusively for Upward Mobility by certified experts and undergo a thorough review process.  This app covers the topics of cardiology patient problems (including  acute coronary syndrome, dysrhythmias and other problems), other patient problems (including pulmonary, endocrine, hematology, neurology, and renal issues) , nursing interventions (both cardiology and pulmonary), and monitoring (both cardiology and pulmonary.   ||  The Cardiac Medicine Subspecialty Certification is an ideal way for the certified critical care nurse to further her career, and Upward Mobility's CMC app is the perfect study tool for the busy nursing professional.   ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
